element.name: asteriskh263
element.description: Extracts H263 video from RTP and encodes in Asterisk H263 format
element.author: Neil Stratford <neils@vipadia.com>

element.name: rtpamrdec
element.description: Extracts AMR audio from RTP packets (RFC 3267)
element.author: Wim Taymans <wim@fluendo.com>

element.name: rtpamrenc
element.description: Encode AMR audio into RTP packets (RFC 3267)
element.author: Wim Taymans <wim@fluendo.com>

element.name: rtpdec
element.description: Accepts raw RTP and RTCP packets and sends them forward
element.author: Wim Taymans <wim@fluendo.com>

element.name: rtpg711dec
element.description: Extracts PCMU/PCMA audio from RTP packets
element.author: Edgard Lima <edgard.lima@indt.org.br>, Zeeshan Ali <zeenix@gmail.com>

element.name: rtpg711enc
element.description: Encodes PCMU/PCMA audio into a RTP packet
element.author: Edgard Lima <edgard.lima@indt.org.br>

element.name: rtpgsmenc
element.description: Encodes GSM audio into a RTP packet
element.author: Zeeshan Ali <zeenix@gmail.com>

element.name: rtpgsmparse
element.description: Extracts GSM audio from RTP packets
element.author: Zeeshan Ali <zeenix@gmail.com>

element.name: rtph263enc
element.description: Encodes H263 video in RTP packets (RFC 2190)
element.author: Neil Stratford <neils@vipadia.com>

element.name: rtph263pdec
element.description: Extracts H263+ video from RTP packets (RFC 2429)
element.author: Wim Taymans <wim@fluendo.com>

element.name: rtph263penc
element.description: Encodes H263+ video in RTP packets (RFC 2429)
element.author: Wim Taymans <wim@fluendo.com>

element.name: rtpmp4vdec
element.description: Extracts MPEG4 video from RTP packets (RFC 3016)
element.author: Wim Taymans <wim@fluendo.com>

element.name: rtpmp4venc
element.description: Encode MPEG4 video as RTP packets (RFC 3016)
element.author: Wim Taymans <wim@fluendo.com>

element.name: rtpmpadec
element.description: Extracts MPEG audio from RTP packets (RFC 2038)
element.author: Wim Taymans <wim@fluendo.com>

element.name: rtpmpaenc
element.description: Encode MPEG audio as RTP packets (RFC 2038)
element.author: Wim Taymans <wim@fluendo.com>
